code: import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const suggestions=[{title:"Common Cold",symptoms:"Sneezing, runny nose, mild fever",meds:["Paracetamol 500mg","Cetirizine 10mg","Steam inhalation"],prescription:["Paracetamol 500mg","500mg","2 times/day","Morning/Evening"]},{title:"Headache",symptoms:"Pain in head, tension",meds:["Ibuprofen 400mg","Paracetamol 500mg","Rest & hydration"],prescription:["Ibuprofen 400mg","400mg","2 times/day","Afternoon/Evening"]},{title:"Stomach Ache",symptoms:"Abdominal pain, bloating",meds:["Dicyclomine","Ranitidine","ORS"],prescription:["Dicyclomine","20mg","3 times/day","After meals"]}];const MedicineSuggestions=_ref=>{let{fillPrescription}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-4",children:"Quick Medicine Suggestion"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid gap-4 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3",children:suggestions.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm mt-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Symptoms:"})," ",item.symptoms]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm mt-2 font-semibold",children:"Suggested Medicines:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc pl-5 text-sm text-gray-700 mt-1 space-y-1",children:item.meds.map((med,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:med},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>fillPrescription(...item.prescription),className:"mt-4 bg-blue-600 text-white text-sm px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-700",children:"Prescribe"})]},idx))})]});};export default MedicineSuggestions;
